description: Hon. Buwaneka Aluwihare, PC, J - 1. Union Bank of Colombo Ltd,...
parties: 1. Union Bank of Colombo Ltd, No. 15A, Alfred Place, Colombo 03. Plaintiff Vs. 1. Emm Chem (Pvt) Ltd, No. 16, Flower Terrace, Colombo 07. 2. Kodduru Arachchige Don Adrin Lakshman Perera, No. 25/4A, Jayapura Mawatha, Baddegana, Kotte South, Pitakotte. 3. Mailwaganam Surendran, No. 53A, Maradana Road, Hendala, Wattala. Mailwaganam Surendran, No. 53A, Maradana Road, Hendala, Wattala. (Defendant-Respondents)
